templates.textTemplate:
kafka:
  bootstrap:
    servers: "localhost:9094"
  security:
    protocol: "PLAINTEXT"
    sasl:
      mechanism: "PLAIN"
  health:
    streams:
      enabled: true
  streams:
    default:
      num:
        stream:
          threads: 1
      health:
        enabled: false
      key:
        serde: org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringSerde
      value:
        deserializer: org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ByteArrayDeserializer
      application:
        id: "word-count"
      processing:
        guarantee: "at_least_once"
      replication:
        factor: "-1"
